task.title: Troubleshooting Software
task.shortdesc: No physical issues? Maybe your software needs to be updated!

step.cmd: Visit Synology's official website to see if new software has been released.
Download the newest version of the software to your device.
Log into your network administrator account for your router.

stepresult.note: Your network administrator account is the account you made after installing your router. It's used for logging into your Synology network.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Firmware Update section and upload the new file.

stepresult.note: Do not interrupt this new update; it could severely damage your router.

step.cmd: Check your device's connection to see if the issue has been resolved.
